### Here's EnviroScreen
```{r}
env_scrn_df <- read_csv(here("data", "CalEnviroScreen.csv")) %>% 
  clean_names() %>% 
  rename(nearby_city = nearby_city_to_help_approximate_location_only,
         lon = longitude,
```
